statements: SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory
SELECT equipment_name, category FROM equipment_inventory
SELECT equipment_name, purchase_date FROM equipment_inventory
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory WHERE category = 'Electronics'
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_notes FROM equipment_inventory
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY purchase_date DESC, equipment_id ASC;
SELECT equipment_name, category FROM equipment_inventory WHERE purchase_date > '2020-01-01' AND category IN ('Electronics', 'Tools') ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_count, MAX(purchase_date) AS latest_purchase_date FROM equipment_inventory WHERE equipment_name LIKE 'Printer%' OR category = 'Office Supplies';

SELECT equipment_name, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM purchase_date) AS purchase_year, LENGTH(maintenance_notes) AS notes_length FROM equipment_inventory ORDER BY purchase_year ASC, notes_length DESC, equipment_name;
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS category_count FROM equipment_inventory GROUP BY category HAVING category_count >= 2 ORDER BY category_count DESC, category ASC;
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity, location FROM equipment_inventory;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, quantity, location FROM equipment_inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE technician='John Doe';
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_description FROM maintenance_records ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment_inventory
SELECT equipment_name, location FROM equipment_inventory WHERE quantity > 0
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM equipment_inventory WHERE location LIKE '%Office%'
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_description, technician FROM equipment_inventory JOIN maintenance_records ON equipment_inventory.equipment_id = maintenance_records.equipment_id
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM Equipment WHERE maintenance_status = 'Due';
SELECT equipment_id, purchase_date FROM Equipment ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY last_inventory_date;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_cost FROM MaintenanceRecords WHERE maintenance_cost > 500;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM Equipment WHERE purchase_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceRecords WHERE maintenance_cost > 1000 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM Equipment JOIN MaintenanceRecords ON Equipment.equipment_id = MaintenanceRecords.equipment_id WHERE maintenance_status = 'Overdue';
SELECT equipment_name, quantity, location FROM Equipment JOIN Inventory ON Equipment.equipment_id = Inventory.equipment_id WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, purchase_date FROM Equipment WHERE maintenance_status = 'Due' OR maintenance_status = 'Overdue';
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, purchase_date FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, purchase_date, maintenance_date FROM equipment;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_records;
SELECT * FROM equipment
SELECT equipment_name, purchase_date FROM equipment ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_type FROM equipment JOIN maintenance_records ON equipment.equipment_id = maintenance_records.equipment_id
SELECT department_name, manager_id FROM departments INNER JOIN employees ON departments.manager_id = employees.employee_id
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE department = 'Engineering'
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT id, name, description FROM equipment WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT name, description FROM equipment WHERE last_maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT staff_id, name, role FROM maintenance_staff WHERE role = 'Technician';
SELECT * FROM equipment ORDER BY name DESC, id ASC;
SELECT name, quantity FROM equipment WHERE quantity > 10;

SELECT equipment.name, maintenance_logs.maintenance_date, maintenance_logs.maintenance_type FROM equipment INNER JOIN maintenance_logs ON equipment.id = maintenance_logs.equipment_id WHERE maintenance_logs.maintenance_type = 'Routine';

SELECT maintenance_staff.name, maintenance_schedule.scheduled_date, maintenance_schedule.notes FROM maintenance_staff INNER JOIN maintenance_schedule ON maintenance_staff.staff_id = maintenance_schedule.staff_id;
SELECT equipment.name, equipment_status.status FROM equipment JOIN equipment_status ON equipment.id = equipment_status.equipment_id AND equipment_status.status = 'Operational';
